subject: Brake Pedal not working correctly
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased your Plus X pedals and they seem to have developed a
fault, the brake pedal no longer registers any input, the accelerator and
clutch are fine but the brake will not register.

I have made sure all the cables are plugged in and I have tried different
USB ports on my PC but still nothing.

Please can you advise.

Kind regards

Sam.

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Burnett,  Have you adjusted the brake damping? If so, please click the “Offset” button in the software, then re-set the initial pedal position in the pop-up window. After that, recalibrate and test the pedal again.

Hi,

Just tried that just now and it still won't read the brake pedal inputs.

I have been using these pedals for 2 weeks or so with no issue but
yesterday it disconnected a couple of times and then went back to normal,
it was registering inputs but they were not consistent or accurate and now
it will not register any input from the brake.

The pedals have been connected to the ground wire on the control box so it
shouldn't be EMI.

Would this be a brake pedal problem or a problem with the control box?

Thanks.

On Thu, Oct 9, 2025 at 9:48 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Sam Burnett,    I will send you a replacement brake sensor tomorrow to resolve this issue.

Hi,

That's perfect thanks,

How does one fit a brake pedal sensor?
